Oh Lord, may this liv -- ing in -- cor -- rupt -- i -- ble seed With -- in me en -- liv -- en -- ing, grow un -- to mat -- ur -- i -- ty. Let Your life with -- in me sat -- u -- rate, Let Your life with -- in me per -- me -- ate. May all Your ful -- ness be ex -- pressed through me And my be -- ing be con -- formed to Thee.

lyrics.stanza: Oh Lord, for this I pray: Make my heart the good earth So that You may grow in me, grow and grow continually. Oh Lord, may this living incorruptible seed Within me enlivening, grow unto maturity.
Let Your life within me saturate, Let Your life within me permeate. May all Your fulness be expressed through me And my being be conformed to Thee.
Increase my love for You so that I would love You, Return Your love with Yours, responding to Your call; Reveal more of Yourself to me so I can see Your divine economy, shine on me Your speaking.
